verses.name: Exodus 39:31
verses.text: And they tied unto it a lace of blue, to fasten it on high upon the mitre; as the Lord commanded Moses.

verses.name: Exodus 39:32
verses.text: Thus was all the work of the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation finished: and the children of Israel did according to all that the Lord commanded Moses, so did they.

verses.name: Exodus 39:33
verses.text: And they brought the tabernacle unto Moses, the tent, and all his furniture, his taches, his boards, his bars, and his pillars, and his sockets,

verses.name: Exodus 39:34
verses.text: And the covering of rams’ skins dyed red, and the covering of badgers’ skins, and the vail of the covering,
